aston.gui

Class PetrolGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • aston.gui.PetrolGUI

  • public class PetrolGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    The Simulation as a Graphical Interface. This first creates the Parameter GUI that sets the information, from probability to the number of tills and pumps. This runs a simulation b ased on the given informaiton from the Parameter GUI
    Version:
    19/04/2017
    Author:
    Kelvin M., Tristan P.

    • Method Detail

      • newSimulation

        private void newSimulation()
        GUI Simulation presenting the Pump's/Till's queue.
        This is created based on the parameters given from the Main GUI Frame

      • exitApp

        private void exitApp()
        Closes the Program.
        This is only used within the parameter GUI.

      • getDetails

        private void getDetails()
        Gets the details from the Main GUI Parameter Checker

      • display

        public void display(java.lang.String info)
        This Displays the info to the Simulation GUI in parts to the JTextFields.
        The information is split using a comma delimiter.
        Parameters:
        info - - The Queue Information.
        This is split for the GUI to accommodate the JTextFields.

      • guiVisible

        public void guiVisible()
        Makes the GUI Visible to the user.

        Initialises all the JTextFields and stores them in an array.
